content:
{"name": "Magnolia Meals At Home", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A meal delivery program providing nourishing meals at no cost to households affected by cancer.
*Eligible participants will receive up to two months of home meal deliveries, each of which will include ten meals that are designed to help meet the nutritional needs of cancer patients and up to ten additional meals for their family members, if requested by the participant.
*Eligible patients must live in or around Nutley, NJ, New Haven, CT and areas in New York.
Contact your local advocacy representative to send your completed enrollment form:
Kathy Nugent, LCSW- CancerCare; knugent@cancercare.org Phone: 1-201-301-6809 Toll-free: 1-800-813-HOPE ext. 6809", "email": "", "url": "https://www.magnoliamealsathome.com/contactus", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9546793, "longitude": -74.07159709999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 301-6809", "type": "voice"}]}
